Introduction

JinE is a South Korean Singer. She is a former member of South Korean Girlgroup OH MY GIRL. She was on hiatus since August 2016 in order to receive treatment for anorexia. JinE officially left WM Entertainment and OH MY GIRL on October 30th, 2017.

She was debuted with OH MY GIRL on April 21, 2015 with self titled mini-album.

On October 30, 2017, she officially left OH MY GIRL and WM Entertainment due to her continuing health problems.
